title: Offroad Driving
description: Realistic off-road driving game with dynamic terrain physics.
shortDesc: Experience extreme terrain driving with realistic vehicle physics and immersive environments. Choose from a range of vehicles and conquer hills, mud, water, and rough roads. Explore open landscapes and push your off-road skills to the limit.
roles: Led solo development of an off-road driving simulator using Unity 3D.
Implemented terrain interaction systems, vehicle dynamics, and real-time physics.
Created multiple environments and level types including hills, rivers, and mud paths.
Designed control schemes for both tilt and touch steering with responsive UI.
Built unlockable vehicle system with varying stats (torque, grip, suspension).
Integrated rewarded ads, coin economy, and IAP for new vehicles and upgrades.
Optimized rendering and physics to maintain high frame rate on low-end devices.

contributions.name: Driving Physics & Terrain Systems
contributions.shortDesc: Crafted terrain-aware driving mechanics and dynamic suspension behavior.
details: Simulated realistic suspension, wheel colliders, torque curves, and ground friction.
Implemented different ground materials (mud, rock, sand) with drag and slip factors.
Created terrain deformation and slope resistance for immersive off-road feel.
Balanced vehicle stats for performance, stability, and challenge curve.

contributions.name: Vehicle System & Garage
contributions.shortDesc: Built a modular system for vehicle selection and upgrades.
details: Created multiple driveable vehicles with distinct handling profiles.
Implemented vehicle unlock logic tied to progression and currency.
Added visual customization for wheels, paint, and suspension kits.
Stored vehicle data persistently using scriptable and saved states.

contributions.name: UI/UX & Control Schemes
contributions.shortDesc: Developed intuitive driving interface and feedback systems.
details: Implemented HUD for speedometer, gear, tilt angle, and terrain warnings.
Designed multiple control modes: button-based, tilt, and joystick.
Built responsive garage UI, pause menus, and challenge mode indicators.
Optimized layout for one-handed and two-handed mobile gameplay.

contributions.name: Monetization & Progression
contributions.shortDesc: Balanced free-to-play design with rewarding progression.
details: Implemented rewarded ads for coins, fuel boosts, and retry options.
Integrated coin-based economy for vehicle unlocks and upgrades.
Supported IAPs for coin packs and ad-free experience.
Designed level challenges and terrain tracks that encourage replayability.

contributions.name: Optimization & Publishing
contributions.shortDesc: Ensured high performance and deployment readiness.
details: Used terrain LODs, mesh baking, and lightmapping for smooth rendering.
Maintained consistent frame rate on devices with limited GPU/CPU power.
Compressed textures and used memory pools to reduce runtime spikes.
Published game to Google Play with ASO-friendly metadata and assets.
